txt_en: If you have good thoughts they will shine out of your face like sunbeams and you will always look lovely.
txt_cn: 你若思想美好，面容就会如阳光般灿烂，看上去永远可爱迷人。
author: Roald Dahl

txt_en: One of the most sincere forms of respect is actually listening to what another has to say.
txt_cn: 表达尊重最真诚的方式之一就是真正倾听别人说的话。
author: Bryant H. McGill

txt_en: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
txt_cn: 感恩之心赋予过去意义，为当下带来平静，为未来创造愿景。
author: Melody Beattie

txt_en: There is more treasure in books than in all the pirate's loot on Treasure Island.
txt_cn: 书中的宝藏比海盗在金银岛上的所有战利品还要多。
author: Walt Disney

txt_en: The only thing I knew how to do was to keep on keeping on like a bird that flew.
txt_cn: 我唯一会的事情就是像只飞鸟一样继续前进。
author: Bob Dylan

txt_en: Hope sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
txt_cn: 拥有希望可以看见他人不可见的，感受他人不能觉知的，并且实现那些不可能的事。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: A multitude of small delights constitute happiness.
txt_cn: 幸福就是许多小确幸的总和。
author: Charles Baudelaire

txt_en: First keep peace with yourself, then you can also bring peace to others.
txt_cn: 首先让自己保持平和，然后你也可以给别人带来平和。
author: Thomas à Kempis

txt_en: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights.
txt_cn: 真爱都是悄然降临，既不旗幡招展，也不灯火辉煌。
author: Erich Segal

txt_en: Do not look for happiness outside yourself. The awakened seek happiness inside.
txt_cn: 不要向外寻找快乐，开悟之人在内心寻找幸福。
author: Peter Deunov

txt_en: One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar.
txt_cn: 一个人内心有了飞翔的冲动，就不会满足于在地上匍匐。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: If I create from the heart, nearly everything works; if from the head, almost nothing.
txt_cn: 如果我随心创作，几乎一切都很顺利；如果我靠头脑来创作，几乎什么也做不成。
author: Marc Chagall

txt_en: Without the dark there isn’t light. Without the pain there is no relief.
txt_cn: 没有黑暗，也就没有光明。没有痛苦，也就没有痛苦的缓解。
author: Jenny Lawson

txt_en: Life is partly what we make it, and partly what it is made by the friends we choose.
txt_cn: 生活一部分是我们自己创造的，另一部分是由我们选择的朋友造就的。
author: Tennessee Williams

txt_en: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
txt_cn: 即使是幸福的生活也不可能没有一丝黑暗，如果没有悲伤来平衡，快乐这个词就会失去意义。
author: Carl Jung

txt_en: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
txt_cn: 没有什么比温柔更有力量，也没有什么比真正的力量更温柔。
author: Saint Francis de Sales

txt_en: True friends are never apart, maybe in distance but never in heart.
txt_cn: 真正的朋友从不分离，也许相距甚远，但心永远相连。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: The constant happiness is curiosity.
txt_cn: 求知欲是长久的快乐。
author: Alice Munro

txt_en: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.
txt_cn: 我过去遇到的困难将帮助我在未来取得成功。
author: Philip Emeagwali

txt_en: Dreams are like stars. You may never touch them, but if you follow them, they will lead you to your destiny.
txt_cn: 梦想就像星星。也许你永远无法触碰，但如果你跟随它们，它们将引领你找到人生的路。
author: Liam Payne

txt_en: All the adversity I’ve had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me.
txt_cn: 我生命中经历的所有逆境，所有的困难和障碍，都让我变得更强大。
author: Walt Disney

txt_en: Your life is a reflection of your thoughts. If you change your thinking, you change your life.
txt_cn: 你的生活是你思维的反映。如果你改变了你的思维，你就改变了你的生活。
author: Brian Tracy

txt_en: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.
txt_cn: 无论生活看起来多么困难，总有一些你可以做，并能获得成功的事情。
author: Stephen Hawking

txt_en: A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
txt_cn: 成功的生活就是早上起床，晚上睡觉，白天做自己想做的事。
author: Bob Dylan

txt_en: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
txt_cn: 衡量成功的标准不是看一个人在生活中所处的地位，而是看他所克服的障碍。
author: Booker T. Washington

txt_en: Live your life as though your every act were to become a universal law.
txt_cn: 过好你的生活，就像你的每一个行为都将成为一个普遍规律。
author: Immanuel Kant

txt_en: Every artist was first an amateur.
txt_cn: 每个艺术家在一开始都是外行。
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
